item.title: The Rightly Ordered Church: Deacons: Those Who Serve Well
item.description: The Rightly Ordered Church: Deacons: Those Who Serve Well Bible Verses 1 Timothy 3:8-13; Acts 6:1-6 Preacher Jason Tarn Preached on April 20, 2019 Sermon description In a rightly ordered church, the classifications of the world get reversed, so that whoever would be great must be a deacon to all, i.e. a servant. Thatâ€™s why those specifically called to the office of deacon should be honored and honorably sought in the church.
